header.subtitle: Here's the latest across your spaces.

community.title: Community Hub
community.description: Our community forums and discussion boards are coming soon. Connect with other users, share ideas, and get support from peers.

events.title: Events Calendar
events.description: The events management system is on its way. You'll soon be able to track, create, and manage both virtual and in-person events.

expenses.title: Expenses
expenses.subtitle: Track and manage your business expenses, receipts, and reimbursements.
expenses.cardDesc: Track your business expenses, upload receipts, and manage reimbursements all in one place.
expenses.cardHint: This feature is coming soon and will include expense tracking, receipt management, and automated categorization.

agent.title: AI Agent
agent.greeting: Hello! I'm your AI assistant. How can I help you today?
agent.response: I understand your request. Let me help you with that.

marketplace.title: Marketplace
marketplace.subtitle: Discover and connect with professional service providers for your business needs.
marketplace.noServices: No services found in this category
marketplace.noServicesHint: Try selecting a different category or check back later for new services.

integrations.title: Integrations hub
integrations.subtitle: Connect the SaaS tools your teams rely on and stream their data into a single BeWorking dashboard.
integrations.activeConnectionsHint: Data pushes occur automatically based on the sync interval configured for each integration.
integrations.roadmapHint: These integrations are already in development. Vote for priority or register early access.

automation.title: Automation canvas
automation.subtitle: Sketch BeWorking automations visually. Drag nodes, connect steps, and sync the workflow with your n8n instance.
automation.paletteHint: Choose blocks to add to the flow.
automation.noEdges: No edges yet. Connect this node to another step.
automation.selectNodeHint: Choose a block in the canvas to edit configuration and connections.

reports.title: Analytics & reports
reports.subtitle: Connect your data warehouse or BI layer to export curated dashboards.

adminBookings.title: Bookings overview
adminBookings.subtitle: All reservations across BeWorking locations. Integrate with your booking API to surface real data.

tickets.title: Support tickets
tickets.subtitle: Track tenant requests and SLA across the workspace.
